triggeredEntityDefinition.name: JVM Heap utilization is too high

name: JVM Heap utilization is too high
description:
AppDynamics has detected a problem with Node mediadataservice-appd-ue1c-565bc88856-tl5dz.
JVM Heap utilization is too high continues to violate with critical.
All of the following conditions were found to be violating
For Node mediadataservice-appd-ue1c-565bc88856-tl5dz:
1) JVM|Memory:Heap|Used % Condition
Used %'s value was greater than the threshold 90.00 for 7 times in the last 30 minutes.
